content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":254332,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞待機しておく","translatedEnglishLine":"> Stand by"},{"lineNumber":254333,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、バレス軍の様子","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, the state of the Bares army"},{"lineNumber":254334,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍の攻撃は続いているが、なんとか防げている","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army's attacks continue, but they are managing to defend somehow"},{"lineNumber":254335,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人シルキィは出てこないようだな、ランス殿は待機中か・・","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems the demon Silky isn’t coming out; is Lord Rance standing by..."},{"lineNumber":254336,"originalJapaneseLine":"勝てなくていい、守り切れればいいと防衛に徹した戦いを続けている","translatedEnglishLine":"They continue fighting defensively, thinking they don’t have to win, just survive the defense"},{"lineNumber":254337,"originalJapaneseLine":"苦戦しているががんばっている様子","translatedEnglishLine":"They are struggling but seem to be doing their best"},{"lineNumber":254338,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場で戦うランス達","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others fight on the battlefield"},{"lineNumber":254339,"originalJapaneseLine":"何戦かした後、向こうに魔物将軍が居るようです","translatedEnglishLine":"After several battles, it appears there is a demon general over there"},{"lineNumber":254340,"originalJapaneseLine":"無理する必要ないしな、シルキィちゃんと戦う為に体力温存しないといけないし","translatedEnglishLine":"No need to push it; need to save strength for fighting Silky-chan properly"},{"lineNumber":254341,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうするかな","translatedEnglishLine":"What shall we do?"},{"lineNumber":254342,"originalJapaneseLine":"向かうかどうかの選択","translatedEnglishLine":"Choice whether to head there or not"},{"lineNumber":254343,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦う　ＨＰ消費","translatedEnglishLine":"> Fight (HP consumption)"},{"lineNumber":254344,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞待機しておく","translatedEnglishLine":"> Stand by"},{"lineNumber":254345,"originalJapaneseLine":"１と同じラフですが、文面は変えて下さい。２回目用です","translatedEnglishLine":"Same rough as 1, but please change the wording. For the second time use."},{"lineNumber":254346,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon army headquarters"},{"lineNumber":254347,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヨシフが怒っている、まだ人間共を押し切れないのか","translatedEnglishLine":"Yoshif is angry; they still can't overwhelm the humans?"},{"lineNumber":254348,"originalJapaneseLine":"えーい、根性のない部隊は後ろから矢をかけてやれ","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey! Shoot arrows at any troops without guts from behind!"},{"lineNumber":254349,"originalJapaneseLine":"死ぬ気で戦わせろ。兵隊などいくらでも補充が聞くからな","translatedEnglishLine":"Make them fight as if their lives depend on it. We have endless soldiers to replace them."},{"lineNumber":254350,"originalJapaneseLine":"ところでシルキィはどうした。","translatedEnglishLine":"By the way, what happened to Silky?"},{"lineNumber":254351,"originalJapaneseLine":"はい、さきほど出撃されましたが・・それが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, she was dispatched earlier but... well..."},{"lineNumber":254352,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場にいないようで","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems she is not on the battlefield."},{"lineNumber":254353,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだと・・逃げたのか","translatedEnglishLine":"What...? Did she run away?"},{"lineNumber":254354,"originalJapaneseLine":"まさか、そんな事は・・ホーネットを人質に取られこれまで","translatedEnglishLine":"No way, that can't be... she has been obedient until now since Hornet was held hostage."},{"lineNumber":254355,"originalJapaneseLine":"これまで言う事を聞いてきたのに今になって逃げるなど","translatedEnglishLine":"She has obeyed until now, but to flee now..."},{"lineNumber":254356,"originalJapaneseLine":"とにかく、敵前逃亡だ、戻ってきたらきついお仕置きをしてやる。","translatedEnglishLine":"In any case, fleeing from the enemy—when she returns, she’ll get a harsh punishment."},{"lineNumber":254357,"originalJapaneseLine":"女として生まれてきた事、不死の魔人になった事、後悔させてやるわ","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ll make her regret being born a woman and becoming an immortal demon."},{"lineNumber":254358,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others"},{"lineNumber":254359,"originalJapaneseLine":"うーん、まだシルキィは現れないか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, Silky still hasn’t appeared..."},{"lineNumber":254360,"originalJapaneseLine":"今日は休みなのか・・・なら俺達も戻るか","translatedEnglishLine":"Is today a break...? Then shall we also return?"},{"lineNumber":254361,"originalJapaneseLine":"その時、報告が来る","translatedEnglishLine":"At that moment, a report arrived."},{"lineNumber":254362,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人シルキィ、リーザス城に現れました。","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Silky has appeared at Leesas Castle."},{"lineNumber":254363,"originalJapaneseLine":"ユーザーの地理を見せる為に地図で説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Explanation with a map to show the geography to the user."},{"lineNumber":254364,"originalJapaneseLine":"この戦場の遙か後方、安全地帯のはずなのに・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Although it should be a safe area far behind this battlefield..."},{"lineNumber":254365,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウレーンが慌てるが","translatedEnglishLine":"Howleen panics but..."},{"lineNumber":254366,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはにゃり、作戦通りと匂わす感じで","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance grins slyly, implying it's all according to plan."},{"lineNumber":254367,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、リーザス城に向かうぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, let’s head to Leesas Castle."},{"lineNumber":254368,"originalJapaneseLine":"少し前","translatedEnglishLine":"A little earlier."},{"lineNumber":254369,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス城、首都","translatedEnglishLine":"Leesas Castle, the capital."},{"lineNumber":254370,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス軍と魔軍が今決戦している場所からはだいぶ離れている","translatedEnglishLine":"It is quite far from where the Leesas army and demon army are currently in a decisive battle."},{"lineNumber":254371,"originalJapaneseLine":"だからといって無防備では無い","translatedEnglishLine":"But that doesn’t mean it is undefended."},{"lineNumber":254372,"originalJapaneseLine":"高い城壁と数千の精鋭兵士が守っている、数万の魔物が今ここに現れても","translatedEnglishLine":"Protected by high castle walls and thousands of elite soldiers, even if tens of thousands of demons appeared here now..."},{"lineNumber":254373,"originalJapaneseLine":"そう簡単に落とせる物ではない","translatedEnglishLine":"It would not fall so easily."},{"lineNumber":254374,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこに　魔人シルキィが一人現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"There, demon Silky appeared alone."},{"lineNumber":254375,"originalJapaneseLine":"この戦いは無意味、魔軍が最終的に勝つ。人類側の抵抗は長く続けば続くほど","translatedEnglishLine":"This battle is futile; the demon army will ultimately win. The longer humanity resists..."},{"lineNumber":254376,"originalJapaneseLine":"死傷者を産む事になる","translatedEnglishLine":"...the more casualties it will cause."},{"lineNumber":254377,"originalJapaneseLine":"素早く終わらせる為、国王を命を奪う","translatedEnglishLine":"To end it quickly, she will take the king’s life."},{"lineNumber":254378,"originalJapaneseLine":"遙か昔、人類を守る為に単身で魔王の命を狙ったシルキィ","translatedEnglishLine":"Long ago, Silky single-handedly targeted the demon king’s life to protect humanity."},{"lineNumber":254379,"originalJapaneseLine":"今も人類を守る為に単身で突入する、あの時と違うのは","translatedEnglishLine":"Now she again charges alone to protect humanity, though this time it’s different from before."},{"lineNumber":254380,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの時は無謀な戦いであったが、魔人となった身で人間の城を攻める今回はたやすい","translatedEnglishLine":"Back then it was a reckless fight, but now, as a demon, attacking a human castle is easy."},{"lineNumber":254381,"originalJapaneseLine":"（こういうノリのナレーション、かっこよく入れて欲しいな）","translatedEnglishLine":"(I want a cool narration with this kind of vibe.)"},{"lineNumber":254382,"originalJapaneseLine":"（シルキィは甲冑を外した状態、そして突撃前に甲冑装着）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Silky is without armor, then puts on armor just before charging)"},{"lineNumber":254383,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィ視点でもいいかな","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe from Silky’s perspective is good too."},{"lineNumber":254384,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス城内","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside Leesas Castle."},{"lineNumber":254385,"originalJapaneseLine":"騎士団、親衛隊が守る城の中を魔人シルキィが突っ込んでくる","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Silky charges into the castle defended by the knights and royal guards."},{"lineNumber":254386,"originalJapaneseLine":"レイラ、チルディ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Leila, Tildy..."},{"lineNumber":254387,"originalJapaneseLine":"圧倒的に強い魔人シルキィはどんどん進む","translatedEnglishLine":"The overwhelmingly powerful demon Silky advances rapidly."},{"lineNumber":254388,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが遅れてリーザス城に来た","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance arrived late at Leesas Castle."},{"lineNumber":254389,"originalJapaneseLine":"入り口の門が粉々に壊されている、倒れているリーザス兵","translatedEnglishLine":"The entrance gate is shattered into pieces, Leesas soldiers lie fallen."},{"lineNumber":254390,"originalJapaneseLine":"でも誰も死んでいない","translatedEnglishLine":"But no one is dead."},{"lineNumber":254391,"originalJapaneseLine":"レイラ、チルディあたりと会話してもいいかな","translatedEnglishLine":"May I have a conversation with people like Leila and Tildy?"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞待機しておく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Stand by

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、バレス軍の様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the state of the Bares army

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の攻撃は続いているが、なんとか防げている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army's attacks continue, but they are managing to defend somehow

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人シルキィは出てこないようだな、ランス殿は待機中か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems the demon Silky isn’t coming out; is Lord Rance standing by...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝てなくていい、守り切れればいいと防衛に徹した戦いを続けている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They continue fighting defensively, thinking they don’t have to win, just survive the defense

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 苦戦しているががんばっている様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are struggling but seem to be doing their best

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場で戦うランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others fight on the battlefield

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何戦かした後、向こうに魔物将軍が居るようです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After several battles, it appears there is a demon general over there

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理する必要ないしな、シルキィちゃんと戦う為に体力温存しないといけないし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No need to push it; need to save strength for fighting Silky-chan properly

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうするかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What shall we do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向かうかどうかの選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Choice whether to head there or not

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦う　ＨＰ消費
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Fight (HP consumption)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞待機しておく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Stand by

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １と同じラフですが、文面は変えて下さい。２回目用です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Same rough as 1, but please change the wording. For the second time use.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon army headquarters

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヨシフが怒っている、まだ人間共を押し切れないのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yoshif is angry; they still can't overwhelm the humans?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、根性のない部隊は後ろから矢をかけてやれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey! Shoot arrows at any troops without guts from behind!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死ぬ気で戦わせろ。兵隊などいくらでも補充が聞くからな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make them fight as if their lives depend on it. We have endless soldiers to replace them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ところでシルキィはどうした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, what happened to Silky?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、さきほど出撃されましたが・・それが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, she was dispatched earlier but... well...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場にいないようで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems she is not on the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだと・・逃げたのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What...? Did she run away?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか、そんな事は・・ホーネットを人質に取られこれまで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way, that can't be... she has been obedient until now since Hornet was held hostage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これまで言う事を聞いてきたのに今になって逃げるなど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She has obeyed until now, but to flee now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とにかく、敵前逃亡だ、戻ってきたらきついお仕置きをしてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In any case, fleeing from the enemy—when she returns, she’ll get a harsh punishment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女として生まれてきた事、不死の魔人になった事、後悔させてやるわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll make her regret being born a woman and becoming an immortal demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、まだシルキィは現れないか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, Silky still hasn’t appeared...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日は休みなのか・・・なら俺達も戻るか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is today a break...? Then shall we also return?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時、報告が来る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, a report arrived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人シルキィ、リーザス城に現れました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Silky has appeared at Leesas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ユーザーの地理を見せる為に地図で説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation with a map to show the geography to the user.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦場の遙か後方、安全地帯のはずなのに・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Although it should be a safe area far behind this battlefield...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウレーンが慌てるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Howleen panics but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはにゃり、作戦通りと匂わす感じで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance grins slyly, implying it's all according to plan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、リーザス城に向かうぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let’s head to Leesas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し前
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A little earlier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城、首都
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leesas Castle, the capital.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍と魔軍が今決戦している場所からはだいぶ離れている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is quite far from where the Leesas army and demon army are currently in a decisive battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だからといって無防備では無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But that doesn’t mean it is undefended.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 高い城壁と数千の精鋭兵士が守っている、数万の魔物が今ここに現れても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Protected by high castle walls and thousands of elite soldiers, even if tens of thousands of demons appeared here now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう簡単に落とせる物ではない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It would not fall so easily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに　魔人シルキィが一人現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There, demon Silky appeared alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦いは無意味、魔軍が最終的に勝つ。人類側の抵抗は長く続けば続くほど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This battle is futile; the demon army will ultimately win. The longer humanity resists...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死傷者を産む事になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...the more casualties it will cause.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 素早く終わらせる為、国王を命を奪う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To end it quickly, she will take the king’s life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遙か昔、人類を守る為に単身で魔王の命を狙ったシルキィ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Long ago, Silky single-handedly targeted the demon king’s life to protect humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今も人類を守る為に単身で突入する、あの時と違うのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now she again charges alone to protect humanity, though this time it’s different from before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの時は無謀な戦いであったが、魔人となった身で人間の城を攻める今回はたやすい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Back then it was a reckless fight, but now, as a demon, attacking a human castle is easy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （こういうノリのナレーション、かっこよく入れて欲しいな）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I want a cool narration with this kind of vibe.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （シルキィは甲冑を外した状態、そして突撃前に甲冑装着）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Silky is without armor, then puts on armor just before charging)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィ視点でもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe from Silky’s perspective is good too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城内
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside Leesas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 騎士団、親衛隊が守る城の中を魔人シルキィが突っ込んでくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Silky charges into the castle defended by the knights and royal guards.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイラ、チルディ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leila, Tildy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 圧倒的に強い魔人シルキィはどんどん進む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The overwhelmingly powerful demon Silky advances rapidly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが遅れてリーザス城に来た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance arrived late at Leesas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 入り口の門が粉々に壊されている、倒れているリーザス兵
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The entrance gate is shattered into pieces, Leesas soldiers lie fallen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも誰も死んでいない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But no one is dead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイラ、チルディあたりと会話してもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: May I have a conversation with people like Leila and Tildy?

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞待機しておく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Stand by

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、バレス軍の様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the state of the Bares army

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の攻撃は続いているが、なんとか防げている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army's attacks continue, but they are managing to defend somehow

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人シルキィは出てこないようだな、ランス殿は待機中か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems the demon Silky isn’t coming out; is Lord Rance standing by...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝てなくていい、守り切れればいいと防衛に徹した戦いを続けている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They continue fighting defensively, thinking they don’t have to win, just survive the defense

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 苦戦しているががんばっている様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are struggling but seem to be doing their best

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場で戦うランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others fight on the battlefield

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何戦かした後、向こうに魔物将軍が居るようです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After several battles, it appears there is a demon general over there

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理する必要ないしな、シルキィちゃんと戦う為に体力温存しないといけないし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No need to push it; need to save strength for fighting Silky-chan properly

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうするかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What shall we do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向かうかどうかの選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Choice whether to head there or not

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦う　ＨＰ消費
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Fight (HP consumption)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞待機しておく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Stand by

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １と同じラフですが、文面は変えて下さい。２回目用です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Same rough as 1, but please change the wording. For the second time use.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon army headquarters

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヨシフが怒っている、まだ人間共を押し切れないのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yoshif is angry; they still can't overwhelm the humans?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、根性のない部隊は後ろから矢をかけてやれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey! Shoot arrows at any troops without guts from behind!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死ぬ気で戦わせろ。兵隊などいくらでも補充が聞くからな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make them fight as if their lives depend on it. We have endless soldiers to replace them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ところでシルキィはどうした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, what happened to Silky?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、さきほど出撃されましたが・・それが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, she was dispatched earlier but... well...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場にいないようで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems she is not on the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだと・・逃げたのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What...? Did she run away?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか、そんな事は・・ホーネットを人質に取られこれまで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way, that can't be... she has been obedient until now since Hornet was held hostage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これまで言う事を聞いてきたのに今になって逃げるなど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She has obeyed until now, but to flee now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とにかく、敵前逃亡だ、戻ってきたらきついお仕置きをしてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In any case, fleeing from the enemy—when she returns, she’ll get a harsh punishment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女として生まれてきた事、不死の魔人になった事、後悔させてやるわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll make her regret being born a woman and becoming an immortal demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、まだシルキィは現れないか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, Silky still hasn’t appeared...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日は休みなのか・・・なら俺達も戻るか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is today a break...? Then shall we also return?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時、報告が来る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, a report arrived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人シルキィ、リーザス城に現れました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Silky has appeared at Leesas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ユーザーの地理を見せる為に地図で説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation with a map to show the geography to the user.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦場の遙か後方、安全地帯のはずなのに・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Although it should be a safe area far behind this battlefield...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウレーンが慌てるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Howleen panics but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはにゃり、作戦通りと匂わす感じで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance grins slyly, implying it's all according to plan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、リーザス城に向かうぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let’s head to Leesas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し前
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A little earlier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城、首都
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leesas Castle, the capital.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍と魔軍が今決戦している場所からはだいぶ離れている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is quite far from where the Leesas army and demon army are currently in a decisive battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だからといって無防備では無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But that doesn’t mean it is undefended.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 高い城壁と数千の精鋭兵士が守っている、数万の魔物が今ここに現れても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Protected by high castle walls and thousands of elite soldiers, even if tens of thousands of demons appeared here now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう簡単に落とせる物ではない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It would not fall so easily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに　魔人シルキィが一人現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There, demon Silky appeared alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦いは無意味、魔軍が最終的に勝つ。人類側の抵抗は長く続けば続くほど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This battle is futile; the demon army will ultimately win. The longer humanity resists...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死傷者を産む事になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...the more casualties it will cause.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 素早く終わらせる為、国王を命を奪う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To end it quickly, she will take the king’s life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遙か昔、人類を守る為に単身で魔王の命を狙ったシルキィ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Long ago, Silky single-handedly targeted the demon king’s life to protect humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今も人類を守る為に単身で突入する、あの時と違うのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now she again charges alone to protect humanity, though this time it’s different from before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの時は無謀な戦いであったが、魔人となった身で人間の城を攻める今回はたやすい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Back then it was a reckless fight, but now, as a demon, attacking a human castle is easy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （こういうノリのナレーション、かっこよく入れて欲しいな）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I want a cool narration with this kind of vibe.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （シルキィは甲冑を外した状態、そして突撃前に甲冑装着）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Silky is without armor, then puts on armor just before charging)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィ視点でもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe from Silky’s perspective is good too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城内
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside Leesas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 騎士団、親衛隊が守る城の中を魔人シルキィが突っ込んでくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Silky charges into the castle defended by the knights and royal guards.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイラ、チルディ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leila, Tildy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 圧倒的に強い魔人シルキィはどんどん進む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The overwhelmingly powerful demon Silky advances rapidly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが遅れてリーザス城に来た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance arrived late at Leesas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 入り口の門が粉々に壊されている、倒れているリーザス兵
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The entrance gate is shattered into pieces, Leesas soldiers lie fallen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも誰も死んでいない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But no one is dead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイラ、チルディあたりと会話してもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: May I have a conversation with people like Leila and Tildy?
